name: Custom userstyles
description: A Darker userstyles.org with some "animated" menu effects and better style browsing.

user.name: Animatorium
user.about:
Modifying site styles for my browsing experience
(some are made for others, since it just takes a short time), thought i should share. PayPal alternative url since site issues: Donation

additional_info:
Change log: Color update.

past: left sidebar scrollbar hidden. twitter icon update. Positions update. Code quotes color in Forum discussions. Edit page minor changes. Settings and Update icon colors. Android page positions fix. (+Update Positions)Color and width changes because Android update. Major color fix and changes. Navigation Links width fix. Icon file url update. Just "share this style" color. Home carousel arrows hover effect(Size+ 100ms). Text Shadow removed while in row style viewing. Ads and colors while viewing styles in rows and hover while at that = size+(230% 250/150ms). Error explanation text color change (thanks to @SunDawning & @calico女 noting that) and "my account" width/height and text(numbers only) size +20%. Notes: Navigation items(←), All icons replaced with bigger resolution versions and size+.
